itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway announce the launch of the Drinkin Bros Sports podcast and YouTube feeds — Like and Subscribe — before breaking down the CFP rankings, the Broncos’ quarterback dumpster fire, how mediocre the Raiders are, and if Ohio State...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway announce the launch of the Drinkin Bros Sports podcast and YouTube feeds — Like and Subscribe — before breaking down the CFP rankings, the Broncos’ quarterback dumpster fire, how mediocre the Raiders are, and if Ohio State deserves a spot in the playoffs.

 

ghostbed.com/drinkinbros

Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway announce the launch of the Drinkin Bros Sports podcast and YouTube feeds — Like and Subscribe — before breaking down the CFP rankings, the Broncos’ quarterback dumpster fire, how mediocre the Raiders are, and if Ohio State deserves a spot in the playoffs.

Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway announce the launch of the Drinkin Bros Sports podcast and YouTube feeds — Like and Subscribe — before breaking down the CFP rankings, the Broncos’ quarterback dumpster fire, how mediocre the Raiders are, and if Ohio State deserves a spot in the playoffs.
